TEXT.S:
kumadas,komadas (:) namauzip i Taywan, Lipun, China timul atu teban. u masay-adidi'ay a kilang. tanaya' ku masay katukuh 18m.
u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma u kakuniza salaedan: Plantae panan: Magnoliophyta upiz: Magnoliopsida mata: Celastrales sapamat: Celastraceae mikitinay: Celastrus hicahicaay: C. punctatus
malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika :Celastrus punctatus1502,250
